scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace flateralus build:watch" "yarn workspace @bracketbear/cms dev" "yarn workspace @bracketbear/website dev"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @bracketbear/cms build && yarn workspace @bracketbear/website build
scripts.deploy: yarn workspace @bracketbear/cms deploy && yarn workspace @bracketbear/website deploy
scripts.generate: concurrently --kill-others --success second "yarn workspace @bracketbear/cms start" "yarn workspace @bracketbear/website generate"
